Class PlayerBoard.BuildRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.PlayerBoard.BuildRow
  • Enclosing class:
    PlayerBoard

    private class PlayerBoard.BuildRow
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a single build row (to centralize some of the related logic)
    Author:
    jsnhlbr5

        public boolean canAddTiles(Color color)
        Checks if tiles of the given color can be added to this build row
        Parameters:
        color - the color of tiles to be checked
        Returns:
        true if one or more tiles of the given Color can be added, false otherwise

      • addTiles

        public TileCollection addTiles(TileCollection tc)
        Adds the given tiles to this row, returning any overflow
        Parameters:
        tc - the set of tiles to add
        Returns:
        a TileCollection representing the overflow tiles (is an empty collection if no overflow)
